name: HONC
description:
This game is my entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 on the theme Joined Together.

In this little 2D game, you need to join atoms together to create larger and larger molecules. You can create them as you like, as long as you still follow the laws of physics! The goal is to discover all the molecules I have found names for, but feel free to assemble your own ;)

This is my second game made in Python with Pygame. I created all the code and the visuals, the music was made by a friend, Bycob, and the other assets are credited below.

Source code : github.com/charon25/honc.
